Plot: A lawyer is asked to come to the police station to clear up a few loose ends in his witness report of a foul murder. This will only take ten minutes, they say, but it turns out to be one ...
Title: Under Suspicion
Writer: John Wainwright (book), Claude Miller, Jean Herman, Michel Audiard, Tom Provost (screenplay), W. Peter Iliff (screenplay)
Actors: Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Thomas Jane, Monica Bellucci
tomatoConsensus: Though Hackman and Freeman turn in solid performances, Under Suspicion moves at a plodding rate and has a disappointing ending.
